name: react-table

scripts.build:css: rimraf react-table.css && stylus src/index.styl --compress -o react-table.css && yarn css:autoprefix
scripts.build:es: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir es --source-maps inline
scripts.docs: yarn watch & cd docs && yarn && yarn start
scripts.docs:build: yarn build && cd docs && yarn && yarn build
